sentences.en: A shriek stirred me from sleep.
sentences.cn: 尖叫声把我从睡梦中唤醒.

sentences.en: All of a sudden he let out a piercing shriek.
He let out a shriek of abandoned laughter.
Her voice rose to a shriek.
Instead of an answering cry I heard shriek from the natives.
sentences.cn: 我听见的不是欢呼,而是众人的尖声惊叫.

sentences.en: People sometimes shriek because of terror, anger, or pain.
sentences.cn: 人们有时会因为恐惧, 气愤或疼痛而尖叫.

sentences.en: She let out a shriek of laughter.
Suddenly he began to shriek loudly.
sentences.cn: 突然他开始大声尖叫起来.

sentences.en: Sue let out a terrific shriek and leapt out of the way.
sentences.cn: 休发出一声尖叫，跳到了一边。

sentences.en: The ladies shriek and swoon at his every word.
sentences.cn: 他的每一句话都令那些女士为之尖叫，为之痴狂。

sentences.en: The shriek sent shivers ( up and ) down my spine.
sentences.cn: 那尖叫声使我的背脊起了一阵寒 颤.

sentences.en: The steam pipes rattled suddenly, and Franklin uttered a shriek and jumped with fright.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽管突然发出咯咯的响声，富兰克林尖叫一声，吓得跳了起来。

sentences.en: They were awakened by a weird shriek.
sentences.cn: 他们被一声怪叫吵醒了.

sentences.en: They were dragged from their homes, shrieking and weeping.
sentences.cn: 他们哭喊着被人从家里拖出去。

sentences.en: With a shriek, a fierce night - bird passes.
sentences.cn: 哇的一声, 夜游的恶鸟飞过了.

trans.tran_cn: 尖叫声，尖锐的声音：一种能使人联想起这种尖叫的声音
trans.tran_en: a loud high sound made because you are frightened, excited, angry etc
to make a very high loud sound, especially because you are afraid, angry, excited, or in pain

trans.tran_cn: 尖叫，引人注意，发出一种类似尖叫的声音
